Title: Relates to the operation of a motor vehicle by deaf or hard of hearing drivers
Summary: Relates to the operation of a motor vehicle by deaf or hard of hearing drivers; provides that no deaf or hard of hearing driver shall be required to wear a hearing aid while operating a motor vehicle provided that their vehicle is equipped with a full view mirror.
LawCode: Add ยง1229-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the operation of a motor vehicle by deaf or hard of hearing drivers
